description:
A quality Duracell battery to power your favourite small devices

  • Also known as: DL2430, BR2430, KL2430, L2430, ECR2430, 5011LC, L20, KCR2430, E-CR2430, KECR2430, LF1/2W
  • Guaranteed for 10 years in storage with Duracell’s Duralock Power Preserve™ Technology
  • Common application: calculators, clocks, watches, lights, bike computers, car alarm remotes, cameras and more
name: Duracell 2430 3V Lithium Battery
